ygData.subject: Ebay..I can't believe it
ygData.msgSnippet: Has anybody seen what you can buy for Everquest on Ebay...if you want a laugh go to www.ebay.com in the search box type everquest *** where *** is your server
ygData.messageBody:
Has anybody seen what you can buy for Everquest on Ebay...if you want a
laugh go to www.ebay.com in the search box type everquest *** where *** is
your server name..ex "everquest karana". See what comes up. I saw 5000PP
going for over $100.00..I also saw a bloodforge hammer going for
$30.00...that's real money..I see them sell for around 30pp in the game..Am
I to understand a Platinum is equivalant to a dollar..I could only
dream...just thought everybody would get a kick out of that. What are your
thoughts on this practice? Anybody have any nightmare stories about getting
ripped off?

Chrisstauf Lightbringer
Cleric of the 12th circle
Karana server
